original: @224b # // rgya gar skad du /

original: bod skad du /

original: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
analyzed: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: 'dzam gling nyid du glang chen thal ka ltar gshegs gang //

translated: and then descended into the human world like an elephant.游댷By this sublime auspiciousness, may there be well-being here today!

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam par zas gtsang sras //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam par zas gtsang sras //
translated: In the sublime city of Kapilavastu, the son of 콐uddhodana,

original: bud med skyon bral g-yo sgyu spangs pa lha mdzes yum //
analyzed: bud med skyon bral g-yo sgyu spangs pa lha mdzes yum //
translated: whose mother was M캐y캐dev캶, free from the faults of womanhood,

original: lhums su zla bcur blo gros ldan pa sh'akya'i rigs //
analyzed: lhums su zla bcur blo gros ldan pa sh'akya'i rigs //
translated: remained in the womb for ten months, wise, of the 콐캐kya clan.游댷By this sublime auspiciousness, may there be well-being here today!

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / lum bi'i tshal ni dben zhing nyams dga' pla ksha yi //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / lum bi'i tshal ni dben zhing nyams dga' pla ksha yi //
translated: In the Lumbini Grove, delightful and secluded, he took hold of a branch of the tree

original: yal ga nas bzung bltams gyur tshang dang brgya byin 'dud //
analyzed: yal ga nas bzung bltams gyur tshang dang brgya byin 'dud //
translated: and was born, while Indra and Brahm캐 bowed down.

original: mkha' la gshegs te phyogs bcur padma byung gyur gang //
analyzed: mkha' la gshegs te phyogs bcur padma byung gyur gang //
translated: The lotus that arose in the ten directions,游댷By that holy auspiciousness, may there be well-being here today.

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'di bde legs shog / gzhal med khar mdzes dam par drang srong 'dun mdzad nas //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'di bde legs shog / gzhal med khar mdzes dam par drang srong 'dun mdzad nas //
translated: Having gathered the assembly of sages in the excellent celestial palace,游댷And having declared the auspicious signs, the Teacher will appear,

original: mtshan ltas shis par brjod de ston par 'byung 'gyur dang // sh'aka rigs bud med 'khor ldan kun bsus rgyan btags gang //
analyzed: mtshan ltas shis par brjod de ston par 'byung 'gyur dang // sh'aka rigs bud med 'khor ldan kun bsus rgyan btags gang //
translated: And the Shakya women, having taken the wheel, will be adorned with ornaments.游댷By that holy auspiciousness, may there be well-being here today.

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / gzhon nu'i stobs ni @225a * //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / gzhon nu'i stobs ni @225a * //
translated: The youth's strength

original: sgyu rtsal yig rtsis 'phong la sogs //
analyzed: sgyu rtsal yig rtsis 'phong la sogs //
translated: In arts, calculation, archery, and so forth,

original: kun las mthar byung lha mi la sogs kun gyis mchod //
analyzed: kun las mthar byung lha mi la sogs kun gyis mchod //
translated: Having reached the end of all, worshipped by gods, humans, and so forth,

original: sh'akya'i rigs 'khrungs log rtog bsal phyir btsun mo'i 'khor //
analyzed: sh'akya'i rigs 'khrungs log rtog bsal phyir btsun mo'i 'khor //
translated: Born in the Shakya lineage, in order to dispel misconceptions, the retinue of queens游댷By that holy auspiciousness, may there be well-being here today.

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / pho brang nas byung rga na shi ba la sogs gzigs //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / pho brang nas byung rga na shi ba la sogs gzigs //
translated: Having left the palace, seeing old age, sickness, death, and so forth,

original: mi rnams rmongs mdzad lha yis mdun bdar mkha' la ni //
analyzed: mi rnams rmongs mdzad lha yis mdun bdar mkha' la ni //
translated: The gods leading the way, the Buddha, in the sky,

original: srid gsum dag las rgal phyir mthon mthing dbu skra bregs //
analyzed: srid gsum dag las rgal phyir mthon mthing dbu skra bregs //
translated: In order to transcend the three worlds, he shaved his head.游댷By this most auspicious event, may there be happiness and good fortune here today.

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / lha rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis ni ngur smrig gos rnams phul //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / lha rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis ni ngur smrig gos rnams phul //
translated: The gods offered him the saffron robes through their magical power.

original: nee ranydza na'i chu bor dka' thub ma lus rdzogs //
analyzed: nee ranydza na'i chu bor dka' thub ma lus rdzogs //
translated: He completed all austerities on the banks of the Naira침jan캐 River.

original: thub pa bsam gtan la bzheng bkra shis 'o thug bzhes //
analyzed: thub pa bsam gtan la bzheng bkra shis 'o thug bzhes //
translated: The Sage, rising from his concentration, accepted the auspicious rice and milk.游댷By this most auspicious event, may there be happiness and good fortune here today.

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang der 'dir bde legs shog / padma las byung khyu mchog byang chub shing drung du //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang der 'dir bde legs shog / padma las byung khyu mchog byang chub shing drung du //
translated: The supreme one, born from a lotus, sat cross-legged under the Bodhi tree.

original: skyil mo krung bcas mi g-yo mchog gis bdud btul nas //
analyzed: skyil mo krung bcas mi g-yo mchog gis bdud btul nas //
translated: The supreme one, unwavering, subdued the demons.

original: tho rangs bdud btul mi 'gyur phun sum sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: tho rangs bdud btul mi 'gyur phun sum sangs rgyas pa //
translated: At dawn, he subdued the demons and attained perfect Buddhahood.游댷By this most auspicious event, may there be happiness and good fortune here today.

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / w'a r'a na sir chos kyi 'khor lo mgon pos bskor //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / w'a r'a na sir chos kyi 'khor lo mgon pos bskor //
translated: In V캐r캐攷ㅡs캶, the Lord turned the wheel of Dharma.

original: kun shes la sogs lnga sde bzang la bden bzhi bstan //
analyzed: kun shes la sogs lnga sde bzang la bden bzhi bstan //
translated: He taught the four truths to the excellent group of five, including j침캐ta.

original: lha klu lha min mi min 'dun gyur gang //
analyzed: lha klu lha min mi min 'dun gyur gang //
translated: The gods, n캐gas, asuras, and spirits were inspired.

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / nga rgyal snyems par ldan pa'i ston pa drug btul cing //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / nga rgyal snyems par ldan pa'i ston pa drug btul cing //
translated: The six teachers, who were full of pride and arrogance, were subdued,

original: glang chen rab smyo mi bzad lha sbyin gyis rbad btul //
analyzed: glang chen rab smyo mi bzad lha sbyin gyis rbad btul //
translated: and the utterly uncontrollable, crazed elephant was tamed by Devadatta.

original: drang srong mchog la spre'u rgyal cang shes sbrang rtsi phul //
analyzed: drang srong mchog la spre'u rgyal cang shes sbrang rtsi phul //
translated: The king of monkeys offered honey to the supreme sage,游댷may this most auspicious event bring well-being here and now.

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / padmo gzhon nu lta bu'i mtshan ltas sh'akya'i rigs //
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / padmo gzhon nu lta bu'i mtshan ltas sh'akya'i rigs //
translated: The one with the marks of a youthful lotus, born into the Shakya clan,

original: zas gtsang sras su rgyal rigs 'khor los sgyur rgyal du //
analyzed: zas gtsang sras su rgyal rigs 'khor los sgyur rgyal du //
translated: the son of Shuddhodana, a chakravartin of the kshatriya caste,游댷was born and all the gods were completely satisfied. May this most auspicious event bring well-being here and now.

original: bltams pa nas bzung lha yi ma lus rdzogs par ris dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / byams pa'i stobs ni 'gro ba ma lus sgrol mdzad cing //
analyzed: bltams pa nas bzung lha yi ma lus rdzogs par ris dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / byams pa'i stobs ni 'gro ba ma lus sgrol mdzad cing //
translated: The power of love liberates all beings without exception,

original: sems can mtha' yas zhi bde'i lam la bkod gyur te //
analyzed: sems can mtha' yas zhi bde'i lam la bkod gyur te //
translated: and infinite sentient beings are established on the path of peace and happiness.

original: grong khyer rtsva mchog dam par dgongs pa yongs rdzogs gang //
analyzed: grong khyer rtsva mchog dam par dgongs pa yongs rdzogs gang //
translated: In the supreme city of Kushinagar, the perfect intention

original: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The verses of auspiciousness are complete.
